creditline: The Ted and Dr. Roberta Mann Foundation Endowment Fund
description: black and white photograph of a bald man in a suit seated on a pile of rubble; barren landscape
marks: Signature and Date on back, in pencil: [David Goldblatt / 22/10/86]
title: Luke Kgatitsoe in his house, bulldozed in February 1984 by the government after the forced removal of the people of Magopa, black-owned farm, which had been declared a "black spot", Ventersdorp district, Transvaal
